errors.name: MetadataImmutable
errors.msg: Metadata is immutable and cannot be modified or deleted

errors.name: EmptyTags
errors.msg: At least one tag must be provided

errors.name: InvalidRentReceiver
errors.msg: Rent receiver must be agent owner

errors.name: KeyHashMismatch
errors.msg: Key hash does not match SHA256(key)

errors.name: KeyHashCollision
errors.msg: Key hash collision detected - stored key differs from provided key

errors.name: ReservedMetadataKey
errors.msg: Reserved metadata key - use dedicated instruction

errors.name: DeadlineTooFar
errors.msg: Deadline too far in the future (max 5 minutes)

errors.name: InvalidRegistryType
errors.msg: Invalid registry type for this operation

errors.name: RegistryAlreadyExists
errors.msg: Registry already exists for this collection

errors.name: SelfFeedbackNotAllowed
errors.msg: Self-feedback is not allowed - agent owner cannot give feedback to their own agent

errors.name: SelfValidationNotAllowed
errors.msg: Self-validation is not allowed - agent owner cannot validate their own agent

types.name: AgentAccount
docs: Agent account (represents an AI agent identity)
Seeds: [b"agent", asset.key()]
EVM conformity: asset = unique identifier (no sequential agent_id)
Keeps nft_name to avoid extra Metaplex RPC calls

fields.name: owner
docs: Agent owner (cached from Core asset)

fields.name: asset
docs: Metaplex Core asset address (unique identifier)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed (static field - fixed offset)

fields.name: agent_wallet
docs: Agent's operational wallet (set via Ed25519 signature verification)
None = no wallet set, Some = wallet address

fields.name: agent_uri
docs: Agent URI (IPFS/Arweave/HTTP link, max 200 bytes)

fields.name: nft_name
docs: NFT name (e.g., "Agent #123", max 32 bytes)
Kept to avoid extra RPC to Metaplex for display

types.name: AgentOwnerSynced
docs: Event emitted when agent owner is synced after transfer

types.name: AgentRegisteredInRegistry
docs: Event emitted when agent is registered in a specific registry

types.name: BaseRegistryCreated
docs: Event emitted when a base registry is created

types.name: BaseRegistryRotated
docs: Event emitted when base registry is rotated

types.name: FeedbackRevoked
docs: Event emitted when feedback is revoked

types.name: MetadataDeleted
docs: Event emitted when agent metadata is deleted

types.name: MetadataEntryPda
docs: Individual metadata entry stored as separate PDA
Seeds: [b"agent_meta", asset.key(), key_hash[0..8]]
This replaces Vec<MetadataEntry> in AgentAccount for:
- Unlimited metadata entries per agent
- Ability to delete entries and recover rent
- Optional immutability for certification/audit use cases

fields.name: asset
docs: Asset this metadata belongs to (unique identifier)

fields.name: immutable
docs: If true, this metadata cannot be modified or deleted (static - fixed offset)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed (static - fixed offset)

fields.name: metadata_key
docs: Metadata key (max 32 bytes)

fields.name: metadata_value
docs: Metadata value (max 256 bytes, arbitrary binary data)

types.name: MetadataSet
docs: Event emitted when agent metadata is set

types.name: NewFeedback
docs: Event emitted when new feedback is given
feedback_uri stored here only (not in FeedbackAccount)

types.name: RegistryConfig
docs: Per-collection registry configuration - Without counters (off-chain via indexer)
Seeds: ["registry_config", collection.key()]
EVM conformity: counters (total_agents, next_id) computed off-chain

fields.name: collection
docs: Metaplex Core Collection address (also in seeds)

fields.name: registry_type
docs: Registry type: Base (protocol) or User (custom shard)

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority (protocol authority for Base, user for User)

fields.name: base_index
docs: Base registry index (0, 1, 2...) - only meaningful for Base type

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: RegistryType
docs: Registry type - Base (protocol managed) or User (custom shards)

types.name: ResponseAppended
docs: Event emitted when response is appended to feedback

types.name: RootConfig
docs: Root configuration - Global pointer to current base registry
Seeds: ["root_config"]

fields.name: current_base_registry
docs: Current active base registry for new agent registrations

fields.name: base_registry_count
docs: Number of base registries created (for indexing)

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority (can create base registries, rotate)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: UriUpdated
docs: Event emitted when agent URI is updated

types.name: UserRegistryCreated
docs: Event emitted when a user registry is created

types.name: ValidationRequested
docs: Event emitted when validation is requested

types.name: ValidationResponded
docs: Event emitted when validator responds

types.name: WalletUpdated
docs: Event emitted when agent wallet is set or updated
